V03vinv15_u:4: kārayet pratisaṃstaraṇaṃ bhūmir araṇyaṃ ca tricīvaram /

V03vinv15_u:7: Old monks are entitled to veneration
V03vinv15_u:8: buddho bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme;
V03vinv15_u:9: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulānāṃ upasthānaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:10: ko 'smābhir āyuṣmantaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayaitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:12: ko 'smākam arhati agrāsanam agrodakam agrapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhoktum iti?
V03vinv15_u:13: tatraike evam āhuḥ śākyaḥ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv15_u:14: anye tv evam āhuḥ yo brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv15_u:20_0: apare yo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kalyāṇavākyo vākkaraṇenopeto jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ
V03vinv15_u:20_1: sūtradharo vinayadharo mātṛkādharo bahuśruto dhārmakathikaḥ sthaviro rājanyaḥ āraṇyakaḥ
V03vinv15_u:20_2: traicīvariko nāmatikaḥ pāṃsukulikaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ ekāsanikaḥ khalupaścādbhaktiko vṛkṣamūlikaḥ
V03vinv15_u:20_3: śmāśāniko 'bhyavakāśikaḥ naiṣadiko yathāsaṃstariko yo lābhī anityasaṃjñāyāḥ pūrvavad
V03vinv15_u:21: apare evam āhuḥ sarveṣām asmākam āyuṣmanto na sameti yaduta nānāprajñaptyā;
V03vinv15_u:24: yathāsmākaṃ sa bhagavān vyākariṣyati tathainaṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti
V03vinv15_u:25: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:26: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:27: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan;
V03vinv15_u:28: ihāsmakaṃ [Śay-v_4] bhadanta saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upasthānaśālāyaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29: pūrvavad yāvad yathāsmākaṃ bhagavān vyākariṣyati tathainaṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti;
V03vinv15_u:30: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ patipṛcchāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:33: pūrvavad yāvad agrapiṇḍapātam paribhoktum iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:34: vṛddhatarako yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:36: sa ca yuṣmākam arhaty agrāsanam agrodakam agrapiṇḍapātam paribhkotum iti
V03vinv15_u:38: vṛddhatarako bhikṣur yuṣmābhiḥ satkartavyah; pūrvavad yāvad agrāsanaṃ paribhoktum iti
V03vinv15_u:40: Old house-holders, etc., are not entitled to veneration
V03vinv15_u:41: bhikṣavaḥ āgārikān vṛddhān satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:45: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagvān āha:
V03vinv15_u:46: pravrajitān bhikṣavo mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tv āgarikān iti
V03vinv15_u:47: bhikṣavaḥ anyatīrthikān vṛddhān dṛṣṭvā satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:49: iha dhārmikān mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tu bāhyakān iti
V03vinv15_u:50: te śrāmaṇerakān vṛddhapravrajitān dṛṣṭvā satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:51: upasaṃpannān bhikṣavo mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tu śrāmaṇerakān iti
V03vinv15_u:52: te navopasaṃpannān vṛddhān satkurvani gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:57: bhikṣavo na jānate ḥkati varṣāgrāṇītiḥ; (MSV III 124)
V03vinv15_u:58: bhagavān āha; sāmayikam ārocayitavyam; bhikṣavo na jānate kati sāmayikānīti; bhagabān āha:
V03vinv15_u:60: haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ mṛtavārṣikaṃ dīrghavārṣikam iti;
V03vinv15_u:66: ity evaṃ sāmayikam ārocayitvā yaḥ pūrvopasaṃpannaḥ sa vanditavyaḥ
V03vinv15_u:67: apare bhikṣavaś catvāro vandyāḥ; katame catvāro vandyāḥ?
V03vinv15_u:68: sadevakasya [Śay-v_5] tāval lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyās tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddho vandyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70: sarveṣām upasaṃpannānāṃ pūrvopasaṃpannā vandyāḥ [A_315a] sthāpayitvā bhikṣuṇīm;
V03vinv15_u:71: tasyā varṣaśatopasaṃpannāyā api tadahaḥ upasaṃpanno bhikṣur vandyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:74_0: ḥ pārivāsiko mūlapārivāsikaḥ paryuṣitaparivāsaḥ mānāpyacārikaś caritamānāpyo 'darśanāyotkṣiptakaḥ
V03vinv15_u:74_1: apratikarmāyotkṣiptakaḥ apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣiptakaḥ sarvo gṛhī ḥsarvāśḥ cānupasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv15_u:75: yadā bhagavatā yathāvṛddhikayā prajñaptās tadā bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:76: te 'nyonyaṃ satkurvvanto ḥgurukurvantoḥ mānayantaḥ pūjayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā (MSV III 125) yathodake
V03vinv15_u:77: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:78: paśya bhadanta yadā bhagavatā yathāvṛddhikayā prajñaptās tadā bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:79: te 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā yathodake iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:80_0: kim atra bhikṣavaḥ āścaryaṃ yad idānīm mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv15_u:80_3: āgamya bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti pūrvavad yāvad utpalaṃ vā yathodake iti;
V03vinv15_u:81_0: yat tu mayā sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
V03vinv15_u:81_1: vinipatitaśarīreṇa yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya sakalo jambūdvīpanivāsī
V03vinv15_u:81_2: janakāyo yadbhūyasā praṇīte trayastriṃśe devanikāye upapannas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv15_u:83: The story of the francoline, the hare, the monkey and the elephant
V03vinv15_u:84: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśīṣu janapade anyatamasmin vanagahane catvāraḥ prāṇinaḥ prativasanti kapiñjalaḥ śaśo markaṭo gajaś [Śay-v_6] ca;
V03vinv15_u:85: te ca parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānā aśaṃkino yatheṣṭavihāratayā kālam atināmayanti;
V03vinv15_u:86: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ buddhir utpannā; (MSV III 126)
V03vinv15_u:87: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:88: kin tu na jānīmaḥ ko 'smābhiḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:89: yan nu vayaṃ yathāvṛddhikāṃ prajñapayema iti;
V03vinv15_u:90: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhā iti;
V03vinv15_u:93: bhavantaḥ eṣa vaṭavṛkṣaḥ kena kiyatpramāṇo dṛṣṭa iti;
V03vinv15_u:95: mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo matpramāṇa eva uccatveneti;
V03vinv15_u:97: mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo mama tulya evoccatveneti;
V03vinv15_u:101: mayāpy asya dvipatrakasya patreṣv evāvaśyayanbindavo jihvayā nirlīḍhā iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:104: paśyata yūyam enaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ mahatpramāṇākāram; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:106: etasmān mayā phalāni bhakṣayitvāsmin pradeśe uccāraḥ kṛtas tasmād ayaṃ jāta iti;
V03vinv15_u:108: yady evaṃ tvam asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ vṛddha iti;
V03vinv15_u:112: te evaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā satkurvantas tasmin vanagahane itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanti;
V03vinv15_u:113: yadā viṣamanimnāḥ pradeśā gantavyā bhavanti tadā hastinaṃ markaṭo 'bhirohati markaṭam śaśaḥ śaśam api kapiṃjalaḥ
V03vinv15_u:114: teṣām evaṃ pravṛddhasnehānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ ca buddhir utpannā;
V03vinv15_u:115: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ pravṛddhasnehāḥ sagauravāś ca;
V03vinv15_u:117: tāvat kiṃcit kuśalaṃ samādāya vartema iti;
V03vinv15_u:124: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa saprāṇakāni parityajya niṣprāṇakāni;
V03vinv15_u:126: te saprāṇakāni parityajya niṣprāṇakāni paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:128: asti vayaṃ prāṇātipātāt prativiratā no tv adattādānāt prativiramāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:132: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa saparigrahāṇi parityajya niṣparigrahāṇi [Śay-v_7] paribhoktavyāni;
V03vinv15_u:133: te saparigrahāṇi parityajya niṣparigrahāṇi paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:135: asti vayam adattādānāt prativiratāḥ no tu kāmamithyācārāt;
V03vinv15_u:141: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa gamyaiva gantavyā nāgamyā te gamyāṃ gacchanti nāgamyām.
V03vinv15_u:149: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa na yadvā tadvā vipralapitavyam; (MSV III 128)
V03vinv15_u:151: te na yadvā tadvā vipralapanti kiṃ tu vicārya vicārya kālena vācam udīrayanti
V03vinv15_u:159: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa mādanīyāni phalāni parityajyamādanīyāni phalāni paribhoktavyāni;
V03vinv15_u:160: te mādanīyāni phalāni parityajyamādanīyāni phalāni paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:161: yadā te pañcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:162: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:163: yan nu vayam anyān api paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:166: ahaṃ sarvān śākhāmṛgān pratiṣṭhāpayāmi; tataḥ śaśaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:167: ahaṃ sarvān śaśān lomaśān mṛgāṃś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi; [A_316a] hastī kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:168: ahaṃ sarvān hastinaḥ siṃhān vyāghradvīpinaś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi; kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:169: yady evam etat saṃkṣepād yuṣmākam avinayā apadā dvipadāś catuṣpadāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca tān ahaṃ sarvān paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti [Śay-v_8]
V03vinv15_u:171: yāvattiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:172: te anyonyam avyābādhamānās tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:175: śasyavatī vasumatī; te manuṣyair dṛṣṭā anyonyam avyābādhamānā viharantaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:178: ahaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi mamaiṣo 'nubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:179: antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca ḥkathayanti;
V03vinv15_u:182: sarva ete kathayanti mamānubhāvo mamānubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:187: tatra pañcābhijña riṣiḥ prativasati sakalasya vārāṇasīnivāsino janakāyasya pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:188: tato rājā tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:189: maharṣe mama vijite yāvattityagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve anyonyam avyābādhamānāḥ saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:190: devaḥ kālavarṣī sadā puṣpaphalā vṛkṣāḥ śasyavatī ca vasumatī;
V03vinv15_u:194: antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv15_u:196: tan na jñāyate kasyāyam anubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:200: mahārāja ma tavaiṣo 'nubhāvo nāntaḥpurasya na kumārāṇāṃ nāmātyānāṃ na bhaṭabalāgrasya na (MSV IV 130)
V03vinv15_u:202: api tu tava vijite catvāraḥ prāniṇaḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:203: teṣām ayam anubhāva tit; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:205: mahārāja kiṃ tava tair dṛṣṭair api tu yat te samādāya vartante tat samādāya vartasveti; kiṃ
V03vinv15_u:207: pañca vratapadāni; maharṣe kidṛśāni pañca vratapadāni?
V03vinv15_u:208: mahārāja te prāṇinaṃ jīvitān na vyavaropayanti;
V03vinv15_u:213: maharṣe yady evaṃ aham apy etāni pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartema;
V03vinv15_u:214: atha sa rājā pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:215: rājā pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartata iti devyo 'pi pañaca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:216: kumārā amātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadā api pañca vratapadāni samādaya vartitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv15_u:218: rājā brahmadattaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartate sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:219: śrutvā ca punas te 'pi pañcavratapadāni [A_316b] samādaya vartitum ārabdhāḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:220: bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhaḥ
V03vinv15_u:221: tena khalu samayena jambūdvīpe yaḥ kālaṃ karoti sa kāyasya bhedāt praṇīteṣu deveṣū trayastriṃśeṣūpapadyate;
V03vinv15_u:222: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ āpūryamāṇaṃ devaparṣadaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar gāthāṃ bhāṣate; (MSV III 131)
V03vinv15_u:226: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau kapiṃjalaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv15_u:227: śaśaḥ śāriputro bhikṣur markaṭo maudgalyāyano bhikṣur gaja ānandaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:228: tadāpi mayā yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya sakalo jambūdvīpanivāsī janakāyo bhūyasā trayastriṃśe devanikāye upapannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:229: etarhy api mayā yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūyayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā yathodake
V03vinv15_u:231: The Buddha eulogises the order by age
V03vinv15_u:232: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sagauravā viharata sapratīṣāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv15_u:233: sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣur agauravo viharann apratīśaḥ abhayavaśavartī sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:234: āsamudācārikān dharmān aparipūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:235: śaikṣān dharmān aparipūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:236: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham aparipūryānupādāya [Śay-v_10] parinirvāsyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:237: sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ sagauravo viharan sapratīśaḥ sabhayavaśavartī brahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān pūrayiṣyati (MSV III 132)
V03vinv15_u:239: āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:240: śaikṣān dharmān paripūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:241: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūryānupādāya parinirvāsyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:243: yat sagauravā vihariṣyāmaḥ sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ ḥsabrahmacāriṣūḥ sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu:
V03vinv15_u:247: yadā bhagavatā pañcakā vinītās te araṇye prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:248: te araṇye prativasanto āgamyā bhavanti siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tarakṣūṇām
V03vinv15_u:249: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: kutra pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakā āvāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:250: paśyati vihāre; devatābhir apy evaṃ bhagavata ārocitam
V03vinv15_u:251: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ kalayāṇabhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv15_u:253: aho batāhaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kārayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:254: sa kālyam evotthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:255: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau [A_317a] śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:256: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kalyāṇabhadrikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:259: atha kalyāṇabhadriko gṛhapatir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ieam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:260: yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraṃ karayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:263: sa na jānīte kīdṛśaḥ kārayitavya iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:264: yadi trilayanaṃ kārayasi madhye gandhakuṭiḥ kārayitavyā dvayoḥ pārśvayor dve layane;
V03vinv15_u:268: sa na jānīte kati purāḥ kartavyā iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:269: bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcapurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ saptapurā gandhakuṭiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:275: The story of Anāthapiṇḍada: his birth and wonders
V03vinv15_u:276: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ datto nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv15_u:278: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:281: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv15_u:283: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv15_u:284: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti; jñātaya ūcuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:285: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
V03vinv15_u:292: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṃkajam;
V03vinv15_u:293: so 'pareṇa samayena sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito dhātryaṃsagato niṣaṇṇo bahirnirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:307: bhadre sobhano 'smākaṃ putro jātaḥ; nityaṃ dānābhirata iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:308: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py alaṃkariṣyāmi; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:309: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca;
V03vinv15_u:313: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135)
V03vinv15_u:314: nadīm ajīravatīṃ snātuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ; sudatto dārakaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:321: āryaputra kimartham ayaṃ dārako rautīti; tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātam; sā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:329: dattam alaṃkāraṃ yācanakebhyo 'nuprayacchasi; kiṃ tāto dravyeṇārthī?
V03vinv15_u:333: tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ; kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:334: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya;
V03vinv15_u:335: putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi?
V03vinv15_u:336: tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:338: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:339: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti; dharmatā hy eṣā:
V03vinv15_u:340: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
V03vinv15_u:341: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:343: satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo visṛtaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:344: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:348: tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:349: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:350: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:356: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:358: tenāsau dṛṣṭas tathā cintāparaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:359: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:361: saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:362: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi; katarasmin deśe?
V03vinv15_u:367: rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:368: sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:372: śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā;
V03vinv15_u:376: śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
V03vinv15_u:379: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti; tena divasamuhūrtayogena pratīṣṭam
V03vinv15_u:380: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:382: sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:383: daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau;
V03vinv15_u:385: tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:388: sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:390: sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ prārthayate; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:391: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti; sa tatra gatvā naivāsikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ [Śay-v_14]
V03vinv15_u:392: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:394: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam; yady arthī bhavasi preṣya iti
V03vinv15_u:395: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:396: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:397: deva mama rājagṛhe kiṃcit prayojanam; tatra gatvā āgamiṣyāmīti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:398: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138)
V03vinv15_u:400: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati grahīṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:401: ihāgamya devasya cttagrāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:405: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:406: sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
V03vinv15_u:414: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati; rāṣṭraṃ vānena bhaktenopanimantritam?
V03vinv15_u:415: śreṇī vā, pūgo vā parṣado vā?
V03vinv15_u:416: rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ; iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:417: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv15_u:418: vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:419: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,
V03vinv15_u:420: na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
V03vinv15_u:421: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny [A_318b] āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv15_u:422: sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:424: asti gṛhapate śramaṇo [Śay-v_15] gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ (MSV III 139)
V03vinv15_u:425: śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:429: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:430_0: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya
V03vinv15_u:430_1: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ
V03vinv15_u:432: ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:433: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
V03vinv15_u:434: asminn eva rājagṛhe śītavane śmaśāne; labhyaṃ gṛhapate so 'smābhir bhagavān draṣṭum?
V03vinv15_u:435: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv15_u:436: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv15_u:437: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:439: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:441: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv15_u:442: yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam; tasyaitad adhavat:
V03vinv15_u:445: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:452: māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv15_u:453: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv15_u:454: namaskaroti ca; atha madhuskandhasya devaputrasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv15_u:456: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:457: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:459: mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhaviṣyati; na pratikramataḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ? [Śay-v_16]
V03vinv15_u:460: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv15_u:463: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrāma; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati, na pratikramataḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv15_u:467: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas (MSV III 141)
V03vinv15_u:468: te śreyo bhavati; na pratikramataḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv15_u:476: [A_319a] athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:478: aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:480: so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:481: asminn eva śivikādvāre naivāsikaḥ; tasmād aham evaṃ vadāmi:
V03vinv15_u:482: abhikrāma gṛhapate mā pratikrāma; abhikrāmatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv15_u:483: na pratikrāmata iti; athānāthapiṇḍādasya gṛhapater etad abhavat: nāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv15_u:485: yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv15_u:486: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:487: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa caṅkramyate,
V03vinv15_u:489: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva;
V03vinv15_u:490: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:491: upasaṅkramya bhagavantam gṛhapatiḥ pratisaṃmodanayā pratisammodate: (MSV III 142)
V03vinv15_u:492: kaccid bhagavān sukhaṃ śāyita iti; atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv15_u:493: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / [Śay-v_17]
V03vinv15_u:494: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv15_u:497: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:498: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:499: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
V03vinv15_u:500: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv15_u:501: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:502: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv15_u:503: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:504: athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:506: tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv15_u:507: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:508: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv15_u:509: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143)
V03vinv15_u:510: paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv15_u:511: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam [A_319b] avocat;
V03vinv15_u:515: upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv15_u:516: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
V03vinv15_u:520: tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv15_u:522: [Śay-v_18] asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ; tatrāhaṃ prativasāmi
V03vinv15_u:524: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv15_u:526: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv15_u:529: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv15_u:531: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:532: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv15_u:534: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;

V03vinv15_u:905: na tvayā gṛhapate kānicit sāpakṣālāni karmāṇi kṛtāny api tv etasmin pradeśe sthitena tvayā pūrvakānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām ayaṃ pradeśo niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:908: bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva jetavanam udghoṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:910: aho bata bhagavān mamāpi tatprathamataraṃ nāmodgrahaṇaṃ kuryād iti;
V03vinv15_u:911: bhagavatā jetasya kumārasya cetasā cittam ājñāya tatprathamata udgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:913: śrutvā jetaḥ kumāro 'tivābhiprasannaḥ mama bhagavatā tatprathamato nāmodgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv15_u:914: tena prītiprāmodyajātena sarveṇaiva tena dravyajātena bhagavato 'rthāya catūratnamayaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ kāritam;
V03vinv15_u:915: tathā saṃgītakārair api sthaviraiḥ sūtra upanibaddham bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme iti
V03vinv15_u:917: Previous births of Anāthapiṇḍada at the time of the seven Buddhas
V03vinv15_u:918: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:919: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:922_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavate kalpe vipāśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv15_u:922_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:924: tena khalu samayenāsyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ tiṣyo nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:925: tenāyaṃ pradeśaḥ ṣaṭkrośahiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya rājakumārasyāntikāt krītvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:927: tiṣyasya gṛhapater bhāgineyaḥ tatsaṃparkād vipaśyini tathāgate 'tyartham abhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:928: tena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya [Śay-v_28] keśanakhastūpaḥ kāritah; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:929: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāham etaṃ rātrau divā cānāvṛtaṃ pāśyeyam iti tasyāntevasinā samudratīrasthenāvabhāsātmakaṃ maṇiratnaṃ prāvṛtam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:931: tadanubhāvād asau taṃ keśanakhastūpaṃ divā rātrau cānāvṛtaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv15_u:933: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo mama mātulena kumārasyāntikāt krītvā hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:934: evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam;
V03vinv15_u:935: yaś ca teṣām apaścimaka tasyāham antike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām iti
V03vinv15_u:937: yo 'sau tasya gṛhapater [A_324a] bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:938: tato 'rvāg ekatriṃśatime kalpe śikhī nāma sāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad huddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:940: tena kyalu punaḥ samayena puṣyo nāma gṛhaptir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:941: tenāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhatṛtīyān kośān maṇibhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya śikhinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:942: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:943: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:944: tato 'rvak tasminn evaikatriṃśatime kalpe viśvabhuṅ nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:946: tena khalu samayena māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:947: tenāyaṃ pradeśo dvau krośau muktikābhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:948: syāt khalu yuṣmākan bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ [Śay-v_29] sa tena kālena tena samayena māghur māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:949: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:950: tato 'rvāg asmin bhadrake kalpe krakutsundo nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:952: tena khalu samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:953: tenāpy ayaṃ prādeśo gobhiḥ pūrayitvā kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya krakutsundasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśravakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:954: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛthapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:955: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:956: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃṣadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma śāstā loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:958: tena khalu samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:959: tenāpy ayaṃ pradeśaḥ paṭṭair āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya niṣkrīya kanakamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:960: syāt khalu ḥyuṣmākaṃḥ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:961: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam; api tv esa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:962: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān:
V03vinv15_u:964: tena khalu samayena āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:965: tenāpy ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhakroṣaṃ sauvarṇair yāvair āstīrya [A_324b] kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ ;
V03vinv15_u:966: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo anyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir ahbūd iti:
V03vinv15_u:968: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena [Śay-v_30]
V03vinv15_u:969_0: etarhy apy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstā loka utpannas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv15_u:969_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyaśarathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:970: aham apy ardhatrayodaśaśataprivāra imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:971: etarhy apy anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ṣoḍaśalāṅgalāvaktākoṭai saṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya mama saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ
V03vinv15_u:972: bhaviṣyati bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'py aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma śāstā ṣaṇṇavatyarhatkoṭīsahasraparivāra imaṃ pradeśam āgamiṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:973: tena khalu samayena sudhano nāma gṛhapatir udbhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:974: so 'pīmaṃ pradeśaṃ trīṇi yojanāni hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya maitreyasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātayiṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:975: tasyaiva śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:976: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sudhano nāma gṛhaptir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:978: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sudhano nāma grhapatir udbhaviṣyati
V03vinv15_u:980: Anāthapiṇḍada has the power to see absconded treasures, no matter whether close or far away
V03vinv15_u:981: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati svāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:982: sāmantakena śabdo nisṛta anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān ḥapiḥ asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:983: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulānāṃ nānātīrthikaśramaṇabrāhmaṇacarakaparivrājakānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:984: katamena bhavanto lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py [Śay-v_31] antike?
V03vinv15_u:985: tena khalu samayena upagur nāma māṇava tasyām eva parṣadi saṃnisaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:987_0: ahaṃ vicārya bhavatām kathayiṣyāmi yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir
V03vinv15_u:987_1: nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvamikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi
V03vinv15_u:988: so 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś cāravihārānveṣatatparaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho yāvad apareṇa samayenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nadyām ajiravatyāṃ snātvā uttīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:990: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ paśyann eva tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:991: [A_325a] vijñāto 'si gṛhapate kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ tvam yena nidhīn paśyasi sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:995: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ yena nidhīn paśyati
V03vinv15_u:996: sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:999_0: tīrthyakoṭiśatasahasreṇāpi bhikṣavo na sukaram ājñātuṃ yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato
V03vinv15_u:999_1: 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati api tu ratnacitrāntakośo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir
V03vinv15_u:999_2: hiraṇyeśvaraś ca yena nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api
V03vinv15_u:999_3: jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike
V03vinv15_u:1000: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:1001: kiṃ bhadānta anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntakośo hiranyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:1003: anāthapiṇḍadenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtyāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv15_u:1004: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:1005_0: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtany upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau ḥvipacyanteḥ nābdhātau
V03vinv15_u:1005_1: na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
V03vinv15_u:1006: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv15_u:1007: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // [Śay-v_32]
V03vinv15_u:1009: The story of the Pratyekabuddha (concerning a previous life of Anāthapiṇḍada)
V03vinv15_u:1010: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālapratigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv15_u:1011: sa saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvajīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe sāntarjanena udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1012: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv15_u:1013: yāvad anyataro pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1018: bhāgy ahaṃ yasya me udyāne tādṛśaḥ pravrajito 'vasthitaḥ iti prasādajātas taddarśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1019: sa mahātmā nirupadhiśeṣam nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśya parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1020: tatas tena gṛhapatinā suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavāntarjanasahīyena mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1022: tāny asthīni sphaṭikamaye kumbhe ratnair vyāmiśrya prakṣiptāni;
V03vinv15_u:1023: tāny antaḥsthāny avabhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:1024: tatas tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:1025: yathā tasyāsthīni ratnamiśrāṇy atyarthaṃ bhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti evam evāham anena kuśalamūlena ratnacitrāntakośaḥ syāṃ hiraṇyeśvaraś ca iti
V03vinv15_u:1027: yo 'sau gṛhapatiḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1028_0: yad anena pratyekabuddhe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca tiṣyasya gṛhapates
V03vinv15_u:1028_1: bhāgineyena satā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya keśanakhastūpe avabhāsātmake maṇir
V03vinv15_u:1028_2: āropitaḥ tasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntrakośo hiraṇyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1029: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo vyatimiśrāṇām vyatimiśraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1030: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyam yat [Śay-v_33] kṛṣṇāṇi karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitāvyam
V03vinv15_u:1032: tiṣyaḥ puṣyaś ca māghuś ca bhavadatto bṛhaspatiḥ /
V03vinv15_u:1033: āṣāḍhaś ca sudattaś ca sudhano bhavati paścimam //
V03vinv15_u:1034: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇimuktā tṛtīyakam /
V03vinv15_u:1035: gobhiḥ paṭair yavaiḥ koṭir hiraṇyena samucchritā //
V03vinv15_u:1038_0: yadānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā koṭīsaṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasya sakāśān
V03vinv15_u:1038_1: niṣkrīya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaṃ tadā nānādeśanivāsinaḥ śrāddhāś
V03vinv15_u:1040: ārya vayam apy āryasaṃghāya jetavane kiṃcid vastu kārayema –für kārayāma?
V03vinv15_u:1046: tathāpi tu yady etasmin pradeśe labhāmahe kārayāma iti
V03vinv15_u:1047: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1052: māmāgamya śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃghasyārthāya puṇyakriyāvastu kurvanti anujānāmi;
V03vinv15_u:1062: anyeṣāṃ saṃstutikā [Śay-v_34] na santi te vihanyante;
V03vinv15_u:1064: āgantukānām arthāya anuddiṣṭaṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1068: tannivāsino bhikṣavaḥ saṃtrastā apravāritāḥ santaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1069: te bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśrāmitāḥ mārgaśrame prativinodite kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:1073: katham idānīṃ yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthitasya eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayatha;
V03vinv15_u:1074: yady asti vo kaukṛtyaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā prayacchata śayanāsanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1078: tasmād anujānāmi bhaṅgikabhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:1081: traimāsikī pravāraṇā kartavyā śrāvaṇamāse tu dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1082: bhaṅgibhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti
V03vinv15_u:1083: yāvad apare 'pi bhaṅgibhagnakā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1084: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1085: bhaṅgibhagnakān mayā bhikṣavo bhikṣūn āgamya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā prajñaptā,
V03vinv15_u:1088: bhikṣavaḥ tān karmādānaṃ kārayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1089: na te karmādānaṃ kārayitavyāḥ iti; bhikṣavas teṣāṃ lābham anuprayacchanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1090: na teṣāṃ lābho deyah; bhikṣava āmiṣalābham api nānuprayacchanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1091: āmiṣalābhas teṣāṃ no tu vastralābha iti [Śay-v_35]
V03vinv15_u:1097: sarve uddeṣṭavyāḥ pratyekam ekaikasya dvau trayaś catvāro vā yathāpramāṇataḥ sarve paribhoktavyāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1101: kvacid rātrau vastavyam iti; bhikṣavas te punaḥ karma na kurvanti pralubhyante; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1102: dānapatir utsāhayitavyaḥ; sa vai saṃpadyata ity evaṃ kuśalam,
V03vinv15_u:1104: na cet śakyate yāvatāṃ śakyate tāvatāṃ saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1106: yadā bhagavataḥ vaistārikaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ tadā bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1108: dvayos trayāṇām coddeṣṭavyam antataḥ sarveṣāṃ sāmānyena niṣadanaprāmāṇikam uddeṣṭavyam udakasthālakasthānapānīyabhaiṣajyadantakāṣṭhapātrasthānaṃ varjayitvā;
V03vinv15_u:1109: sāmīcī ca parasparam upacāras tu sāmānya eva noddeṣṭavya iti
V03vinv15_u:1111: ekāny araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhapalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni [Śay-v_36] prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata,
V03vinv15_u:1114: mā paścād vipratisāriṇo [A_326b] bhūta iti; āraṇyakatvasya ca bahudhā varṇo bhāṣitaḥ
V03vinv15_u:1115: tadā kecid bhikṣava āraṇyakatvaṃ samādāya araṇye 'dhyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1117: muṣitāḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇagṛhapatikulebhyaś cīvarārthaṃ paryeṣṭim āpadyamānāḥ riṃcanty uddeśaṃ pāṭham svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ manasikāram;
V03vinv15_u:1120: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1121: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1123: āraṇyako bhikṣuḥ pātracīvaraṃ sthāpayitvā dvāraṃ baddhvā tāḍakam ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1124: anayeṣām āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām vighāto jātaḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1125: prakāśe sthāne āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1128: yo bhikṣur āgantuka āgacchati tasmai vastu dadāti lābhaṃ tv ātmanā gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv15_u:1130: tenāsau vihāro dṛṣṭaḥ śūnyaḥ; sa pṛcchati,
V03vinv15_u:1132: upanandasya bhikṣoḥ; sa tena gatvā yācitaḥ; sa kathayati: ayaṃ vihāraḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1133: prativasa; yo 'tra lābhaḥ sa mama iti; tatrāvasthitaḥ; tenāsau vihāro na kadācit saṃmṛṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1137: so 'py upanandasya sakāśād yācitvā tasmin vihāre 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1139: tenāsau saṃmṛṣṭaḥ saṃkāraṃ chorayitvā saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvaiva saṃkārakuṭasamīpe 'vasthitaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1140: yāvad anyatamena bhikṣuṇā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1143: iti; sa kathayati: ko 'py atra hastarakṣāsthitaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1144: tena na kadācit saṃmārjanīpadam api dattam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1146: yāvat tenāsau piṇḍapātam aṭatā dṛṣṭa upālabdhaś ca; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1147: upanando lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti ahaṃ tasya vihāraṃ śodhayāmi?
V03vinv15_u:1148: iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1149: yo lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti tena vihāraḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ iti
V03vinv15_u:1151: abhyatītakālagatānāṃ dānapatīnām nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādeṣṭavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:1157: ārya yady ahaṃ vihāraṃ kārayāmi mamāpi nāmnā dakṣiṇām uddiśasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1165: na tatra kaścid bhikṣuḥ prativasati iti; saṃghasthaviraḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1169: gṛhapate [A_327a] nāham etat saṃdhāya kathayāmi api tu tatra lābho nāsti iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1170: ārya idānīṃ yo madīye vihāre prativasati tam ahaṃ paṭenācchādayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:1171: iti lābho labhyate iti upanandena anupūrveṇa svabhāga iva udgṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1174: yāvad anyatamaḥ piṇḍapātiko caityābhivandakaḥ śrāvastīm āgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1178: sāṃghiko 'yaṃ vihāraḥ kiṃ tūpanandasya bhikṣor uddiṣṭa iti; sa upanandasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:1179: tavoddiṣṭo 'yaṃ vihāro 'tra tiṣṭhāmi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1180: evaṃ kuruṣva iti; sa tatrāvasthitaḥ; sa piṇḍapātiko
V03vinv15_u:1188: kāyasya bhedāt sugato svargaloke deveṣūpapadyata iti;
V03vinv15_u:1189: ye taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ paśyanti te tasya gṛhapater gatvā ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:1191: yāvad apareṇa samayena svayam evāgataḥ paśyati tathaiva taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv15_u:1197: prayaccha me paṭakam iti; piṇḍapātika saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:1198: lābhātmako 'yaṃ yadi na dāsyāmi tathāpy ayaṃ balād grahīṣyati māṃ ca vihārān niṣkāsayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv15_u:1202: yasya prasannaḥ prasannādhikāraṃ karoti tasyaiva sa; upanandasya tu vārṣiko lābhaḥ iti
V03vinv15_u:1203: guṇapriyo lokaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍyātmānaṃ sa putradāraṃ ca;
V03vinv15_u:1206: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antargṛhe bhoktuṃ gatānām adattādāyikair vihārā muṣyante; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1207: dvāraṃ baddhvā kuñcikām ādāya prakramitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1208: corā adattādāyikā pratikuñcikayā muṣanti; bhaganān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1211: adattādāyikā anyaṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā gacchanti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1215: yadi kathayati sajvara iti na moktavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1217: api tv āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā upasthāpayitavyā iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1219: bhikṣavo na jānīte kedṛśī ardhaśākhā iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1220: kukkuro bhikṣavo ardhaśākhā tasya pātraśeṣaṃ dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1222: te stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraṃ ca nakharikābhir upalikhanti uccāraprasrāveṇa nāśayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1223: kukkurapoṣakasyāhaṃ bhikṣavo [Śay-v_39] bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi,
V03vinv15_u:1224: [A_327b] kukkurapoṣakena bhikṣuṇā kālyam evotthāya stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraś ca pratyavekṣitavyaḥ yan nakharikābhir upalikhitaṃ tat samaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1226: kukkurapoṣako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate, sātisāro vartate
V03vinv15_u:1230: yāvat tatrānyatamaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ āgataḥ; upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:1231: mayā nāmeha vihāre saṃghasthavireṇa bhūtvā dvitīyasthavireṇa bhavitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1235: tasmin yo dvitīyasthavirasya lābha sa saṃghasthavirasya; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:1236: ihāpi me eva lābha iti; tatrāpi me sa eva lābhaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1237: kiṃ vinā prayojanena saṃghasthaviratvaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv15_u:1238: sa punas tvaritatvaritam eva vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1240: yathāvṛddhikayā vihāram uddiśa iti; bhikṣavo 'tikrānta iti kṛtvā noddiśanti; upanandaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1241: āyuṣmanta kiṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayata,
V03vinv15_u:1242: yathāvṛddhikayā uddiśata vihāraṃ iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1243: yaḥ saṃghikena vā staupikena ḥvāḥ karaṇīyena gato bhavati tasya śayanāsanaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyam,
V03vinv15_u:1245: upananda atilobhena dvayor vihārayor varṣā upagataḥ ubhayavaihārikaṃ lābhaṃ lapsayata iti sa vṛttāsu varṣāsu lābhaṃ prārthayate naitasmin labhyate nāpy aparasmin;
V03vinv15_u:1247: etat prakaraṇam bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1248: varṣoṣito 'sau deyo 'sya lābhaḥ iti; bhikṣava ubhayavihārābhyām api prayacchanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1252: uhayavihārayor varṣoṣitaḥ kimartham ekasamād dīyate iti;
V03vinv15_u:1253: ḥetat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1255: na ca punar bhikṣuṇā dvayor vihārayor upagantavyaṃ; upagacchati, sātisāro bhavati
V03vinv15_u:1259: ācaritam tasya gṛhapter varṣoṣitasya bhikṣusaṃghasya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ paṭenācchādayitum;
V03vinv15_u:1260: sa paṭakān ādāya āraṇyakānāṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1264: yady atra lābho dīyate tad grahīṣyasi ity uktvā sa tvaramāṇaḥ āraṇyakaṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1276: kiṃ bhūyaḥ prasārayasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1277: [A_328a] gṛhapate upanandas tava vihāre varṣoṣitaḥ tasya santakaṃ prārthayāmi iti;
V03vinv15_u:1280: svahastenaiva dāsyāmi iti; sa lajjitas tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:1282: grāmāntikaṃ gamiṣyāmi iti viditvā grāmāntikavihāraṃ [Śay-v_41] gataḥ nandaṃ pṛcchati;
V03vinv15_u:1285: gṛhapatir apy anyena pathā āraṇyakaṃ vihāram gatvā patākāṃś cārayitvā prakṛāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1288: sa ubhayavihārayor apy atilobhena lābhāt paribhraṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1290: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvaśaṃṣayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:1291: paśya bhadanta upananda atilobhena paṭakāt paribhraṣṭah; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1292: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anena atilobhāt bhaktacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv15_u:1294: The story of the dog vhich was too greedy (being a previous birth of Upananda)
V03vinv15_u:1295: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo nadyā ubhayakūle dvau vihārau,
V03vinv15_u:1299: sa gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃghalābhikānāṃ vihāraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv15_u:1301: sa taṃ paribhujya piṇḍapātikānāṃ vihāraṃ gacchati,
V03vinv15_u:1303: yāvad apareṇa samayena piṇḍapātikānām aupapādukānāṃ lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1305: sa gaṇḍīkukkuraḥ gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śrutvā nadīm uttartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1306: madhyaṃ gatasyāsya saṃghalābhikānāṃ vihāre gaṇḍī dattā;
V03vinv15_u:1310: yo 'sau gaṇḍīkukkuraḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv upanandaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1313: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo na bhikṣuṇā atilobhaḥ kartavyaḥ; karoti,
V03vinv15_u:1319: Precautions to take against quarrelsome monks

V03vinv15_u:1323: naivāsikair upāli bhikṣubhiḥ kalahakārikān bhikṣūn āgacchataḥ śrutvā trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ kartavyāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1325: haimantiko graiṣmiko vārṣakaś ca; ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ katame?
V03vinv15_u:1326: sarvo vihāra uddeṣṭavyaḥ sarvo vihārasāmantakaḥ ḥsarvaḥ parigaṇaḥḥ sarvaḥ parigaṇasāmantakaḥ sarva ārāma sarva ārāmasāmantakaḥ:

V03vinv15_u:1332: te alayanā apratiṣṭhitāḥ kaṃcid doṣaṃ janayiṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:1333: tataḥ paścād gatavegaiḥ gatapratyarthikaiḥ gatapratyamitraiḥ yathāvṛddhikayā [Śay-v_43] śayanāsanam uddeṣṭavyam; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1336: The care of the sick monks and Upananda's mischief again
V03vinv15_u:1349: draṣṭukāmais tair asau bhikṣur dṛṣṭaḥ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:1351: bhadramukhā, nāyam kālagataḥ; atha kasmād atra sthāpitaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:1355: āryā vayam āgārikāḥ santo 'nurakṣaṇayā glānagṛhān ḥnaḥ niṣkāsayāmaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1362: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo glānasya bhikṣor vastuparihāro dātavyaḥ iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1364: āyuṣman upananda hum iti kṛtvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1365: yāvad ṣaḍbhir saptabhir vā divasaiḥ śayanāsanam uddekṣyati iti pāde vraṇapaṭṭakaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1366: śayanāsanoddeśakair bhikṣubhir glāna iti kṛtvā tatsantakaṃ layanaṃ uddiṣṭam;
V03vinv15_u:1368: tatas sa glānāvalokakair bhikṣubhir pṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ sthavirasya pādaḥ svasthībhūtaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1369: nānūktaṃ bhagavatā sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti; tat kiṃ mama [Śay-v_44] vyādhir nityo bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv15_u:1372: kim icchatha māṃ jīrṇalayane prakṣeptum iti; alpāthā bhikṣavo 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti:

V03vinv15_u:1479: The mischief of the Six Monks
V03vinv15_u:1480: ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ caranto rātrau vihāraṃ saṃprāptā yathasaṃstutikayā bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśāmitāḥ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:1481: āyuṣmantaḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatha śayanāsanoddeśakaṃ śabdayata; te kathayanti: kimartham?
V03vinv15_u:1483: śayanāsanaṃ sukhaṃ svaptāḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām uddiṣyayiṣyatha iti; te paryavasthitā kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:1484: yūyaṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayata;
V03vinv15_u:1485: yady asti kaukṛtyam uddiṣata yathāvṛddihikayā [Śay-v_49] śayanāsanam;
V03vinv15_u:1489: yāvan navakā uddiśyante tāvat prabhātā rajanī;
V03vinv15_u:1493: āyuṣmanto yuṣmābhir ekarātrasyārthāya kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ bhikṣusaṃgho viheṭhitaḥ aho bata yūyam ihaiva tiṣṭhata; te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:1494: nandopananda śrāvastīm gacchāmaḥ savātalā eta iti kṛtvā prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1497: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo na rātrau śayanāsanam uddeṣṭavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1502: sa tatrāgocarakuśalaḥ kālyam evotthāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv15_u:1504: tatraiva kuḍyamūlam niśritya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1505: anāthapiṇḍadaś ca tena pathā caityābhivandakaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1507: ārya samantaprāsādike śāsane pravrajya kim ārāṭikāṃ karoṣi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1509: na paśyasi velām āsannām iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:1510: madīyaṃ gṛhaṃ kasmān na gataḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:1513: asti mayā śrutaṃ teṣu [Śay-v_50] teṣu sūtreṣv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti,
V03vinv15_u:1514: nāham tvā jāne nāpi gṛham; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:1516: dhruvaṃ na māṃ vetti ḥnāpi mama gṛhamḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1517: kim atra prāptakālaṃ bhagavantam ālokayāmi yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanam atrāntarāt parikramaṇakāṃ kārayāmi iti viditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1518: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1520: āgantukā bhadanta bhikṣava agocarakuśalā piṇḍapātam aṭantaḥ kālātikramatayā kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:1522: tad yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanaṃ atrāntarāt parikramaṇakāṃ kārayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:1523: yasya yatra velā bhaviṣyati sa tatra piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyate iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1525: tena yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanam atrāntarāt parikramaṇakā kāritā; yasya bhikṣor
V03vinv15_u:1526: yatra velā bhavati sa tatra bhaktakṛtyaṃ karoti
V03vinv15_u:1528: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā tatra kūpaḥ kāritaḥ trikaṭukasya triphalāyāś ca śakaṭabhāra utkṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1534: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1542: yāvad anyatarā strī rūpayauvanasaṃpannā taruṇakasya bhikṣor antike 'tyartham avekṣāvatī [Śay-v_50] tat pānīyaṃ yācate;
V03vinv15_u:1544: nivāryamāṇo 'py acchinnadhārayā dadāti evaṃ sāpi nirīkṣate,
V03vinv15_u:1551: yā strīr bhikṣor antike avekṣāvatī bhavati pratibaddhacittā bhavati tasyā svayaṃ na dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1552: na ca mātṛgrāmasya acchinnayā dhārayā pānīyaṃ dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:1553: antarāntarā vāridhārā cchettavyā vaktavyā vā añjaliṃ pūrayitvā piba iti, anyathā sātisāraḥ

V03vinv15_u:1567: na bhikṣuṇā parakīye lābhe saṃnipatitavyam: saṃnipatati,

V03vinv15_u:1624: jānakā pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti,
V03vinv15_u:1625: ajānanto na pṛcchanti; kāle pṛcchanti; kālātikrāntaṃ na pṛcchanti,
V03vinv15_u:1629: tatra kālajñā buddhā bhagavantaḥ arthopasaṃhitāyāṃ pṛcchāyām;

V03vinv15_u:1635: tenāyam ante ārāmasya uccaśabdo mahāśabdo mahājanakāyasya ca nirghoṣaḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1636: kalahakārakān ānanda mayā bhikṣūn saṃdhāya trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ kṛtāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1638: tasmān na bhikṣubhiḥ prakṛtisthakān bhikṣūn ārabhya trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ kartavyāḥ ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1641: The mischief of the Six Monks again

V03vinv15_u:1643: ṣaḍvargikair bhagavato 'rthāya ekaṃ śobhanavṛkṣaṃ sthāpayitvā [Śay-v_54] anye śobhanavṛkṣā ātmanā gṛhītāḥ;

V03vinv15_u:1650: sa hum iti kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1651: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;

V03vinv15_u:1653: aham asmi bhadanta rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sarvaviṣayodbhavānāṃ ratnānām;
V03vinv15_u:1655: ḥyadḥ avaśiṣṭam yathārhaṃ tad devīnāṃ kumārāṇām amātyānām baṭabalāgrasya;

V03vinv15_u:1660: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv15_u:1661: atha rājā prasenajit kośalo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsnāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1663: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo vṛkṣā api yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyā sthaṇḍilāny api śādvalāny api iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā:
V03vinv15_u:1664: vṛkṣā api yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyā sthaṇḍilāni śādvalāny api iti
V03vinv15_u:1666: vihāroddeśako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ; bhikṣavo 'viśeṣeṇa saṃmanyante; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:1667: pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato vihāroddeśako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1669: chandād gacchati dveṣān mohād bhayād gacchati uddiṣṭānuddiṣṭavihāraṃ na jānāti;
V03vinv15_u:1670: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ vihāroddeśako 'saṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:1672: [Śay-v_54] pañcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgato vihāroddeśakaḥ asaṃmataḥ saṃmantavyaḥ,
